Name: Immunity Adventures
About the game: Travel through blood veins and vessels and eradicate all the viruses to save and protect the body. Do you have what it takes to collect and remove all the viruses? Your body needs help, it needs you! Features 16 Real world viruses 42 Levels 5 Difficulty modes
